thread.section_title: lastminute.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of lastminute.com | www.lastminute.com
thread.title: Ryan Lydon

author: Ryan Lydon
title: Ryan Lydon
text:
I've booked a vacation for four to go to Cuba, now due to work I can't make the outbound flights and have had to make separate arrangements to travel there. I've spoken to Iberia who have informed me that lastminute.com will have to help me change my flights as it'll be cancelled for the return otherwise.
This has now led to multiple calls and promises of call backs, with no luck. They simply don't care and are unwilling to help me resolve (if there's a charge I'm happy to pay it) although Iberia tell me it's down to them to assist.
A holiday costing almost Â£6k and I feel utterly let down - I'd recommend everyone to avoid at all costs.
